Package com.samsthenerd.dyeables.api

Class DyeablesAPI

java.lang.Object
com.samsthenerd.dyeables.api.DyeablesAPI
public class DyeablesAPI extends Object
Main API class for Dyeables.

Use registerDyeProvider(Item, IDyeProvider) or implement IDyeProvider to add a new dye provider.

  • Method Details

    • registerDyeProvider

      public static boolean registerDyeProvider(net.minecraft.item.Item item, IDyeProvider provider)
      Registers a dye provider.

      You don't need to register if you are extending AbstractDyeProviderItem or implementing IDyeProvider on your item

      Parameters:
      item - item to register a provider for
      provider - a IDyeProvider to handle dyeing from this item
      Returns:
      if the provider was registered successfully

    • registerDyeProvider

      public static boolean registerDyeProvider(Collection<? extends net.minecraft.item.Item> items, IDyeProvider provider)
      Like registerDyeProvider(Item, IDyeProvider) but for multiple items
      Parameters:
      items - items to register a provider for
      provider - a IDyeProvider to handle dyeing from these items
      Returns:
      if the provider was registered successfully for all items

    • getDyeProvider

      public static IDyeProvider getDyeProvider(net.minecraft.item.Item item)
      Gets the IDyeProvider associated with the given item, if it has one

      Note that normal vanilla-type dyes will not have a provider so you should handle those separately

      Parameters:
      item - item to get the provider of
      Returns:
      the IDyeProvider for this item, or null if there is none

    • registerDyeableBlockEntityHandler

      public static boolean registerDyeableBlockEntityHandler(net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntityType<? extends net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntity> type, IDyeableBlockEntityHandler handler)
      Registers a dyeable block entity handler.

      You don't need to register if you are implementing IDyeableBlockEntityHandler on your block entity

      Parameters:
      type - block entity type to register a handler for
      handler - handler to register
      Returns:
      if the handler was registered successfully

    • registerDyeableBlockEntityHandler

      public static boolean registerDyeableBlockEntityHandler(Collection<? extends net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntityType<? extends net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntity>> types, IDyeableBlockEntityHandler handler)
      Like registerDyeableBlockEntityHandler(BlockEntityType, IDyeableBlockEntityHandler) but for multiple block entity types
      Parameters:
      types - block entity types to register a handler for
      handler - handler to register
      Returns:
      if the handler was registered successfully

    • getDyeableBlockEntityHandler

      public static IDyeableBlockEntityHandler getDyeableBlockEntityHandler(net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntityType<? extends net.minecraft.block.entity.BlockEntity> type)
      Gets the IDyeableBlockEntityHandler associated with the given block entity type, if it has one
      Parameters:
      type - block entity type to get the handler of
      Returns:
      the IDyeableBlockEntityHandler for this block entity type, or null if there is none
